name: Tennis - Girls Play Sports
description: This class is for girls who want to learn the basics of tennis. Including forehand, backhand, volley and serve, while in a fun safe game play environment. This class is non stop action.
fullDescription: This class is for girls who want to learn the basics of tennis. Including forehand, backhand, volley and serve, while in a fun safe game play environment. This class is non stop action.
whatTheyOffer: This class is for girls who want to learn the basics of tennis. Including forehand, backhand, volley and serve, while in a fun safe game play environment. This class is non stop action.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
